title: S4 Ep107: Hump Day & Merch Day: Wednesday, June 16th, 2021

description:

  • Leona Lewis Says She Was 'Deeply Hurt' by Michael Costello After He Accuses Chrissy Teigen of Bullying (PEOPLE)
